Package net.sf.tweety.action.query.syntax

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlwaysQuery
    This class represents an always query in the action query language S.
    HoldsQuery
    This class represents a holds query in the action query language S.
    NecessarilyQuery
    This class represents a necessarily query in the action query language S.
    QueryProposition
    Action queries are represented as propositional formulas with three possible types of propositions: holds, always and necessarily propositions.
    SActionQuery
    This class represents a single action query in the action query language S, which is based on the query language "P" discussed in the paper: Action Languages. by Michael Gelfond and Vladimir Lifschitz, ETAI: Electronic Transactions on AI, 1998.
